    • NodeTable

      public NodeTable(long nddTableSize, int bddTableSize, int bddCacheSize)
      Construct function for ndd.
      Parameters:
      nddTableSize - The max size of ndd node table.
      bddTableSize - The max size of bdd node table.
      bddCacheSize - The max size of ndd operation cache.

    • NodeTable

      public NodeTable(long nddTableSize, BDD bddEngine)
      Construct function for atomized ndd.
      Parameters:
      nddTableSize - The max size of ndd node table.
      bddEngine - The engine for bdd.

    • mk

      public NDD mk(int field, HashMap<NDD,Integer> edges)
      Create or reuse an ndd node.
      Parameters:
      field - The field of the node.
      edges - Edges of the node.
      Returns:
      The ndd node.

    • performGC

      public void performGC()
      Perform NDD garbage collection. This method is called as a prehook before JDD GC to ensure NDD nodes are cleaned up before BDD nodes are removed.

    • ref

      public NDD ref(NDD ndd)
      Protect a root node from garbage collection.
      Parameters:
      ndd - The root to be protected.
      Returns:
      The ndd node.

    • fixNDDNodeRefCount

      Ref the initialized NDD node with Integer.MAX_VALUE (special label)
      Parameters:
      ndd -

    • deref

      public void deref(NDD ndd)
      Unprotect a root node, such that the node can be cleared during garbage collection.
      Parameters:
      ndd - The ndd node to be unprotected.
